Contrary to widespread consensus, we urge investors to sell AMD based on the belief that the AMD's growth and outperformance will moderate in 2H22.
We believe the PC TAM will normalize post-COVID-19 demand, and GPU demand will decline due to the weaker Crypto-mining market.
We are now seeing improvements in the global supply chain mismatch that impacted the game console market, which we believe will harm AMD's near-term gross margin.
